name: capucine
notes:
**big announcement!!
(13th january 2013)
hi all! i have made the pattern revision. the revised translations will follow. if you find any mistake please leave me a note. thank you!**

the pattern is written for both bulky and super bulky yarn. you will need approximately 100 meters of either yarn for the hat and the same amount for the tassels.

if you need the old version of the pattern, you can find it [on my blog][1]



feel free to use the finished hat for charity or commercial purposes. please do not resell the pattern.




thanks [zahaa][2]for the french translation of the pattern! [here's a link][3] to the document with both english and french version# or you can download the pdf here on revelry with the french version only.

thanks [jjkaede][4] for the japanese translation! [here's a link.][5]

thanks [annatec][6] for the italian translation! [here's a link to her lovely blog.][7]


  [1]: http://navlne.blogspot.cz/2009/12/knitting-pattern-capucine.html
  [2]: http://www.ravelry.com/people/zahaa
  [3]: https://docs.google.com/document/pub?id=1jpvbogk8ok2xj9yvlhbxttx6gbxzg3tcohdq6straws
  [4]: http://www.ravelry.com/people/jjkaede
  [5]: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gr53pkqyumebre6w7yyp4ir6fcsdkono9mkrbl6os_4/edit?pli=1
  [6]: http://www.ravelry.com/people/annatec
  [7]: http://sferruzzandoquaela.blogspot.it/2012/12/berretti-e-ancora-berretti.html
